titles.title: To provide greater support for grandfamilies and older caretaker relatives.
Grandfamilies Act of 2019
Grandfamilies Act of 2019
Grandfamilies Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, Energy and Commerce, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
